text:
Police have arrested three persons for murdering a man in Viruthampet on Tuesday.

Mahesh (22), Sathish (27) and Rajesh (23) - all residents of Mariamman Koil Street, Viruthampet – were drinking alcohol at the burial ground on Monday night.

A man, aged about 22 years, had approached them for a match box. However, the four entered into an argument which led to a fisticuff. In the brawl that ensued, the trio attacked him using liquor bottles and stones, causing grievous injuries.

The man, who is yet to be identified, succumbed to injuries on the spot. The trio surrendered at the Viruthampet police station on Tuesday morning.- Staff Reporter
title: 3 arrested for murder
